welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Calw, Germany! Get ready to be charmed by the picturesque streets, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to immerse yourself in the beauty of our city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stuttgart Echterdingen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Stuttgart Echterdingen Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. A premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Karlsruhe/Baden-Baden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a time limit of 2 hours per device.
